00068 typedef cvmx_ipd_1st_mbuff_skip_t cvmx_ipd_mbuff_not_first_skip_t;
00069 typedef cvmx_ipd_1st_next_ptr_back_t cvmx_ipd_second_next_ptr_back_t;

00071 typedef struct cvmx_ipd_tag_fields
00072 {
00073     uint64_t ipv6_src_ip:1;
00074     uint64_t ipv6_dst_ip:1;
00075     uint64_t ipv6_src_port:1;
00076     uint64_t ipv6_dst_port:1;
00077     uint64_t ipv6_next_header:1;
00078     uint64_t ipv4_src_ip:1;
00079     uint64_t ipv4_dst_ip:1;
00080     uint64_t ipv4_src_port:1;
00081     uint64_t ipv4_dst_port:1;
00082     uint64_t ipv4_protocol:1;
00083     uint64_t input_port:1;
00084 } cvmx_ipd_tag_fields_t;
00085 
00086 typedef struct cvmx_pip_port_config
00087 {
00088     uint64_t parse_mode;
00089     uint64_t tag_type;
00090     uint64_t tag_mode;
00091     cvmx_ipd_tag_fields_t tag_fields;
00092 }cvmx_pip_port_config_t;
00093 
00094 typedef struct cvmx_ipd_config_struct
00095 {
00096     uint64_t first_mbuf_skip;
00097     uint64_t not_first_mbuf_skip;
00098     uint64_t ipd_enable;
00099     uint64_t enable_len_M8_fix;
00100     uint64_t cache_mode;
00101     cvmx_fpa_pool_config_t packet_pool;
00102     cvmx_fpa_pool_config_t wqe_pool;
00103     cvmx_pip_port_config_t port_config;
00104 }cvmx_ipd_config_t;
00105 
00106 extern CVMX_SHARED cvmx_ipd_config_t cvmx_ipd_cfg;
00107 /**
00108  * Gets the fpa pool number of packet pool
00109  */
00110 static inline int64_t cvmx_fpa_get_packet_pool(void)
00111 {
00112     return (cvmx_ipd_cfg.packet_pool.pool_num);
00113 }
00114

00116  * Gets the buffer size of packet pool buffer
00117  */

00120     return (cvmx_ipd_cfg.packet_pool.buffer_size);

00155 /**
00156  * Sets the ipd related configuration in internal structure which is then used
00157  * for seting IPD hardware block
00158  */

00162  * Gets the ipd related configuration from internal structure.
00163  */

00166 /**
00167  * Sets the internal FPA pool data structure for packet buffer pool.
00168  * @param pool  fpa pool number yo use
00169  * @param buffer_size   buffer size of pool
00170  * @param buffer_count  number of buufers to allocate to pool
00171  */
00172 void cvmx_ipd_set_packet_pool_config(int64_t pool, uint64_t buffer_size,
00173                        uint64_t buffer_count);
00174 
00175 /**
00176  * Sets the internal FPA pool data structure for wqe pool.
00177  * @param pool  fpa pool number yo use
00178  * @param buffer_size   buffer size of pool
00179  * @param buffer_count  number of buufers to allocate to pool
00180  */
00181 void cvmx_ipd_set_wqe_pool_config(int64_t pool, uint64_t buffer_size,
00182                        uint64_t buffer_count);
00183 
00184 /**
00185  * Gets the FPA packet buffer pool parameters.
00186  */
00187 static inline void cvmx_fpa_get_packet_pool_config(int64_t *pool,
00188                         uint64_t *buffer_size, uint64_t *buffer_count)
00189 {
00190     if (pool != NULL)
00191         *pool = cvmx_ipd_cfg.packet_pool.pool_num;
00192     if (buffer_size != NULL)
00193         *buffer_size = cvmx_ipd_cfg.packet_pool.buffer_size;
00194     if (buffer_count != NULL)
00195         *buffer_count = cvmx_ipd_cfg.packet_pool.buffer_count;
00196 }
00197 
00198 /**
00199  * Sets the FPA packet buffer pool parameters.
00200  */
00201 static inline void cvmx_fpa_set_packet_pool_config(int64_t pool,
00202                         uint64_t buffer_size, uint64_t buffer_count)
00203 {
00204     cvmx_ipd_set_packet_pool_config(pool, buffer_size, buffer_count);
00205 }
00206 
00207 /**
00208  * Gets the FPA WQE pool parameters.
00209  */
00210 static inline void cvmx_fpa_get_wqe_pool_config(int64_t *pool,
00211                         uint64_t *buffer_size, uint64_t *buffer_count)
00212 {
00213     if (pool != NULL)
00214         *pool = cvmx_ipd_cfg.wqe_pool.pool_num;
00215     if (buffer_size != NULL)
00216         *buffer_size = cvmx_ipd_cfg.wqe_pool.buffer_size;
00217     if (buffer_count != NULL)
00218         *buffer_count = cvmx_ipd_cfg.wqe_pool.buffer_count;
00219 }
00220 
00221 /**
00222  * Sets the FPA WQE pool parameters.
00223  */
00224 static inline void cvmx_fpa_set_wqe_pool_config(int64_t pool,
00225                         uint64_t buffer_size, uint64_t buffer_count)
00226 {
00227     cvmx_ipd_set_wqe_pool_config(pool, buffer_size, buffer_count);
00228 }
00229 
00230 /**
00231  * Configure IPD
00232  *
00233  * @param mbuff_size Packets buffer size in 8 byte words
00234  * @param first_mbuff_skip
00235  *                   Number of 8 byte words to skip in the first buffer
00236  * @param not_first_mbuff_skip
00237  *                   Number of 8 byte words to skip in each following buffer
00238  * @param first_back Must be same as first_mbuff_skip / 128
00239  * @param second_back
00240  *                   Must be same as not_first_mbuff_skip / 128
00241  * @param wqe_fpa_pool
00242  *                   FPA pool to get work entries from
00243  * @param cache_mode
00244  * @param back_pres_enable_flag
00245  *                   Enable or disable port back pressure at a global level.
00246  *                   This should always be 1 as more accurate control can be
00247  *                   found in IPD_PORTX_BP_PAGE_CNT[BP_ENB].
00248  */
00249 void cvmx_ipd_config(uint64_t mbuff_size, uint64_t first_mbuff_skip,
00250              uint64_t not_first_mbuff_skip, uint64_t first_back,
00251              uint64_t second_back, uint64_t wqe_fpa_pool,
00252              cvmx_ipd_mode_t cache_mode, uint64_t back_pres_enable_flag);
00253 /**
00254  * Enable IPD
00255  */
00256 void cvmx_ipd_enable(void);
00257 
00258 /**
00259  * Disable IPD
00260  */
00261 void cvmx_ipd_disable(void);
00262 
00263 void __cvmx_ipd_free_ptr(void);
00264 
00265 void cvmx_ipd_set_packet_pool_buffer_count(uint64_t buffer_count);
00266 void cvmx_ipd_set_wqe_pool_buffer_count(uint64_t buffer_count);
00267 
00268 /**
00269  * Setup Random Early Drop on a specific input queue
00270  *
00271  * @param queue  Input queue to setup RED on (0-7)
00272  * @param pass_thresh
00273  *               Packets will begin slowly dropping when there are less than
00274  *               this many packet buffers free in FPA 0.
00275  * @param drop_thresh
00276  *               All incomming packets will be dropped when there are less
00277  *               than this many free packet buffers in FPA 0.
00278  * @return Zero on success. Negative on failure
00279  */
00280 extern int cvmx_ipd_setup_red_queue(int queue, int pass_thresh, int drop_thresh);
00281 
00282 /**
00283  * Setup Random Early Drop to automatically begin dropping packets.
00284  *
00285  * @param pass_thresh
00286  *               Packets will begin slowly dropping when there are less than
00287  *               this many packet buffers free in FPA 0.
00288  * @param drop_thresh
00289  *               All incomming packets will be dropped when there are less
00290  *               than this many free packet buffers in FPA 0.
00291  * @return Zero on success. Negative on failure
00292  */
00293 extern int cvmx_ipd_setup_red(int pass_thresh, int drop_thresh);
